result.reason: Well-supported UI enhancement to make active connection status more visible in the connection tree via better icons/overlays, requested by multiple users with contributor buy-in
result.approach: Add a setting to toggle between overlay icon and full replacement icon for connected status in the tree; optionally bold the text of active connections using TreeView node font styling

attempts.raw_output:
Now I have full context. The issue requests:
1. More obvious icons for active connections in the tree (bold text, better overlay icons)
2. Auto-select the active connection in the tree when switching tabs (split to #1230)

This is a legitimate UI enhancement request with community support and contributor engagement.
